new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-08 14:00:00) positions.

I have analyzed the Reddit news for both general market sentiment and NVDA specifically. There are conflicting signals regarding NVDA, with some suggesting an overreaction to negative news and others pointing to increased competition and CEO stock sales. To manage risk and capitalize on other opportunities, I will sell a small portion of my NVDA holdings and reallocate some of that capital into MSFT.

First, I will sell 2 shares of NVDA.
Then, I will use the freed-up cash to buy 5 shares of MSFT.
<FINISH_SIGNAL>
